meanings.sent1: My daywork includes cleaning the house and running errands.
meanings.sent2: Most people prefer to do their daywork in the morning when they have more energy.
meanings.sent3: After finishing my daywork, I like to relax with a good book.
meanings.sent4: The daywork of a farmer is never truly done, as there is always something to tend to.
meanings.sent5: The sun shining through the window motivates me to start my daywork early.

meanings.definition: Payment for work done during the day.
meanings.sent1: At the end of the week, I receive my daywork in the form of a paycheck.
meanings.sent2: The fair wage for daywork should be enough to cover living expenses.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly told my boss that I expect a raise in my daywork payment.
meanings.sent4: The value of daywork reflects the dedication and effort put into each task.
meanings.sent5: Receiving daywork compensation feels rewarding after a productive week.
